items.name: AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner

items.summary: Core AWS services, cloud concepts, security, pricing, and architecture fundamentals.

items.name: AWS Cloud Quest: Cloud Practitioner
items.summary: Game-based labs building practical solutions on AWS, reinforcing Cloud Practitioner topics.

items.name: AWS re/Start Graduate

items.summary: Full-time cloud training including AWS services, Linux, networking, and technical support.

items.name: AWS Educate: Introduction to Generative AI
items.summary: Fundamentals of generative AI concepts and how they map onto AWS services and tooling.

items.name: Amazon Connect Developer Specialist
items.summary: Design and configuration of Amazon Connect contact centres, flows, and integrations.

items.name: Certified in Cybersecurity (CC)
items.summary: Security principles, access control, network security, security operations, and incident response at entry level.

items.name: Junior Cybersecurity Analyst Career Path
items.summary: Monitoring and protecting networks, firewalls, cloud security, cryptography, vulnerability assessment, and incident response.

items.name: Cybersecurity Essentials
items.summary: Core concepts of confidentiality, integrity, availability, basic cryptography, and network security controls.

items.name: OPSWAT Introduction to Critical Infrastructure Protection (ICIP)
items.summary: Security considerations and cyber risks for critical infrastructure and industrial environments.

items.name: Cyber Security Foundation Professional Certificate (CSFPC)
items.summary: Foundation-level understanding of security controls, risk, and basic governance.

items.name: IBM Z Day 2024 — Security Certificate
items.summary: Exposure to mainframe security concepts and platform-specific security tooling.

items.name: Cisco DevNet Associate
items.summary: Network programmability, APIs, basic automation, and infrastructure-as-code concepts for Cisco platforms.

items.name: Network Addressing and Basic Troubleshooting
items.summary: IP addressing, DNS, LAN/WAN concepts, and first-line network troubleshooting workflows.

items.name: Extreme Networks Associate — Introduction to Future Networking
items.summary: OSI model, switching and routing basics, and modern enterprise networking concepts.

items.name: Introduction to Packet Tracer
items.summary: Network simulation and basic lab topologies using Cisco Packet Tracer.

items.name: Introduction to IoT
items.summary: IoT fundamentals including connectivity, data flows, and cloud integration patterns.

items.name: ISO/IEC 20000 IT Service Management Internal Auditor
items.summary: IT service management concepts, process auditing, continual improvement, and service quality.

items.name: Jira Fundamentals
items.summary: Working with Jira for issue tracking, agile boards, workflows, and basic configuration.

items.name: Jira Service Management Fundamentals
items.summary: Service projects, queues, SLAs, and request handling in Jira Service Management.

items.name: CompTIA IT Fundamentals+ (ITF+)
items.summary: Overview of IT concepts including hardware, software, databases, networking, and security at entry level.

items.name: Mastering Active Directory: Administration and Fundamentals
items.summary: Active Directory concepts, user and group management, Group Policy, and admin fundamentals.

items.name: IBM Z Day 2024 — AI & Data Certificate
items.summary: Exposure to AI and data workloads on IBM Z and large-scale enterprise platforms.

items.name: IBM Z Day 2024 — Skills Certificate
items.summary: General skills related to IBM Z, enterprise computing, and mainframe environments.
